_header: Jesu Christ that is so free / To mans soul speaketh he
Title(s): A luytel tretys of loue, of Godes passyon
Subjects: Christ, Passion of; Passion; Christ, appeal of, to man
_description: Christ’s Appeal to Man, ‘A luytel tretys of loue, of Godes passyon’ — in quatrains

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Ihesu Crist þat is so freTo Monnes soule spekeþ
                    he…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…ȝiue vs for þin holy mihtAlle comen to heuene
                    briht. Amen.
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title: A luytel tretys of loue / Of Godes passyon (f. 299rb)

Ihesus Crist þat is so freTo Monnes soule spekeþ
                    he…

                    Amen
